publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

seg.line: 聖人以治天下為事者也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: govern N properly

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: All under Heaven; the Empire

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: official business; official purpose; public affairs; public duties 倦於事

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: his/one's own proper task

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: need definitely to

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: confused unruliness

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: political revolt; political unrest, political turmoil; disorderliness, unruliness; acts of political insubordinacy

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: political chaos; political disarray, political disorder

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: OBI 3: come from

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:text.tls:line: they must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: arise

tls:text.tls:line: then they are able to govern it.

sense.def: 焉＝於之 at that point, first then

tls:text.tls:line: then they are able to govern it.

sense.def: make orderly, sort out properly

tls:text.tls:line: then they are able to govern it.

sense.def: govern N properly

tls:text.tls:line: then they are not able to govern it.

sense.def: govern others; conduct government properly

tls:text.tls:line: then they are not able to govern it.

sense.def: govern the contextually determinate N properly

seg.line: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: offer comparisons for something

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: 如日月之食焉 resemble a fact, situation or action expressed by a nominalised sentence

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: the situation that S, the circumstances of S, the details of S

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: medically specialised shaman; medical doctor8

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: try to deal with effectively, attack (a disease or a weak point)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: other people's

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: OBI 5: acute sickness; current state of sickness; also: xīn jí 心疾 "indisposition/illness of the heart/mind"; sickness 斯疾 temporary indisposition; falling sick

tls:text.tls:srcline: 譬之如醫之攻人之疾者然，
tls:text.tls:line: Things are the same as with a doctor who wants to cure someone else's disease.

sense.def: be like this situation/case> be like the case of S

tls:text.tls:line: He must certainly know where the disease arises from,

sense.def: need definitely to

tls:text.tls:line: He must certainly know where the disease arises from,

sense.def: understand properly; understand and respect properly; be sure of the workings (of something);

tls:text.tls:line: He must certainly know where the disease arises from,

sense.def: abstract: illness

tls:text.tls:line: He must certainly know where the disease arises from,

sense.def: OBI 3: come from

tls:text.tls:line: He must certainly know where the disease arises from,

sense.def: (abstractly) from

tls:text.tls:line: then he is able to cure it.

sense.def: 焉＝於之 at that point, first then

tls:text.tls:line: If he does not know where the disease arises from,

sense.def: (abstractly) from

tls:text.tls:line: then he is not able to cure it.

sense.def: could not, cannot, fail to; be unable to

tls:text.tls:line: then he is not able to cure it.

sense.def: not (Vt to V)

tls:text.tls:line: then he is not able to cure it.

sense.def: cure the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: then he is not able to cure it.

sense.def: have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to

tls:text.tls:line: How, then, should it be any different for those who govern disorder?

sense.def: make orderly, sort out properly

tls:text.tls:line: How, then, should it be any different for those who govern disorder?

sense.def: political chaos; political disarray, political disorder

tls:text.tls:line: How, then, should it be any different for those who govern disorder?

sense.def: the situation of Nab, the circumstances of Nab, the details of Nab

tls:text.tls:line: How, then, should it be any different for those who govern disorder?

sense.def: how in this only case> how on earth?

tls:text.tls:line: How, then, should it be any different for those who govern disorder?

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:text.tls:line: They must certainly know where the disorder arises from,

sense.def: need definitely to

tls:text.tls:line: then they are able to govern it.

sense.def: 焉＝於之 at that point, first then

tls:text.tls:line: then they are not able to govern it.

sense.def: read chí: reduce the contextually determinate N to order

tls:text.tls:line: then they are not able to govern it.

sense.def: read chí: get into working order, cause to be in working order

seg.line: 聖人以治天下為事者也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: to reduce to order; to put in order (the administration etc); to be in administrative charge of, to deal with, take care of; to be in charge of, take administrative responsibility for; to regulate, make regular, control (as breath)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: think that the N Vs; consider that S;

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: object marker: 把(這個東西) also: 以。。。而。。。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人以治天下為事者也，
tls:text.tls:line: As for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: 以N為V: regard N as V-ing; believe that N V-s 以汝為死

tls:text.tls:line: they inevitably have to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: have to; must; should by all means; should not fail to

tls:text.tls:line: they inevitably have to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: look closely into, pay close attention to and investigate

tls:text.tls:line: they inevitably have to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: something chaotic; a chaotic state; a chaotic situation, political chaos

tls:text.tls:line: they inevitably have to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: OBI 5: from; starting out from a place; 自楚之滕 "went from Chu3 to Te2ng" also a time: 所自生 "that wherefrom something is born"

tls:text.tls:line: Let us try to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: one should (NOTE THAT MANY ATTRIBUTIONS FROM vt+V[0] HAVE TO BE MOVED HERE.)

tls:text.tls:line: Let us try to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: investigate the question whether S

tls:text.tls:line: Let us try to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: 何以知其然 "using what does one know that this is so?"

tls:text.tls:line: Let us try to investigate where the disorder arises from.

sense.def: arise

tls:text.tls:line: It arises from the fact that people do not spare each other.

sense.def: arise from N

seg.line: 雖至大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者，

tls:text.tls:line: Even with the great ones who bring their families into disorder mutually or with the rulers who attack their countries mutually,

sense.def: if; or if (often with implicit subject and without 則 in main clause, and note 若...是 as in 若晉常先，是楚弱也 which has many parallels. Apodosis often )

tls:text.tls:line: If one made everyone in the world spare each other

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:line: and spare others as they spare their [own] bodies,

sense.def: take special/preferential care for

tls:text.tls:line: and spare others as they spare their [own] bodies,

sense.def: preposed object topic> others in general

tls:text.tls:line: and spare others as they spare their [own] bodies,

sense.def: to V2 in the way one is V1-ing> like, just as

tls:text.tls:line: would there still be those who would not practice filial piety?

sense.def: still; nonetheless; in spite of everything (said in S and not said in S)

tls:text.tls:line: would there still be those who would not practice filial piety?

sense.def: feel/show loving care for one's parents and seniors

tls:text.tls:line: would there still be those who would not practice filial piety?

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

seg.line: 視父兄與君若其身惡施不孝？

tls:text.tls:srcline: 視父兄與君若其身惡施不孝？
tls:text.tls:line: If one regarded one's father, older brother, and ruler like one's own body, how could one not [yet] practice filial piety?

sense.def: treat (equally etc)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 視父兄與君若其身惡施不孝？
tls:text.tls:line: If one regarded one's father, older brother, and ruler like one's own body, how could one not [yet] practice filial piety?

sense.def: and 衛侯逐公叔戍與其黨，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 視父兄與君若其身惡施不孝？
tls:text.tls:line: If one regarded one's father, older brother, and ruler like one's own body, how could one not [yet] practice filial piety?

sense.def: like

tls:text.tls:srcline: 視父兄與君若其身惡施不孝？
tls:text.tls:line: If one regarded one's father, older brother, and ruler like one's own body, how could one not [yet] practice filial piety?

sense.def: one's own, his own

tls:text.tls:srcline: 視父兄與君若其身惡施不孝？
tls:text.tls:line: If one regarded one's father, older brother, and ruler like one's own body, how could one not [yet] practice filial piety?

sense.def: how? i.e. in no way!

seg.line: 故大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者有亡。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者有亡。
tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, there would be no more great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and no more rulers who would attack each other's countries.

sense.def: each others' N 相亂國 “vt each others' state"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者有亡。
tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, there would be no more great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and no more rulers who would attack each other's countries.

sense.def: cause to be chaotic, reduce to chaos; mix something chaotically into (something else); wreak havoc in; disrupt

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者有亡。
tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, there would be no more great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and no more rulers who would attack each other's countries.

sense.def: launch an attack (which is not necessarily successful) against; direct attack; assault, personally attack (a person); sometimes used very generally: attack (an opponent, in any way) [The examples have to be distributed into the subcategories below.]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者有亡。
tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, there would be no more great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and no more rulers who would attack each other's countries.

sense.def: clan, household

tls:text.tls:line: If one made everyone in the world spare each other,

sense.def: if; or if (often with implicit subject and without 則 in main clause, and note 若...是 as in 若晉常先，是楚弱也 which has many parallels. Apodosis often )

tls:text.tls:line: If one made everyone in the world spare each other,

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:line: If one made everyone in the world spare each other,

sense.def: if, counter to fact

tls:text.tls:line: [for 有亡 read 亡有] Therefore, there would be no more lack of filial piety and parental care.

sense.def: read wú yǒu: not exist

tls:text.tls:line: [for 有亡 read 亡有] Therefore, there would be no more lack of filial piety and parental care.

sense.def: crime of unfilial behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: [for 有亡 read 亡有] Therefore, there would be no more lack of filial piety and parental care.

sense.def: callousness, unfeeling cruelty

tls:text.tls:line: who would still cause disorder?

sense.def: who (on earth)

tls:text.tls:line: who would still cause disorder?

sense.def: create havoc, create political turmoil

tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be robbers and murderers?

sense.def: still; nonetheless; in spite of everything (said in S and not said in S)

tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be robbers and murderers?

sense.def: villains of any kind

tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be robbers and murderers?

sense.def: final question particle after verbal sentence 管仲儉乎？"Was Guǎnzhòng stingy?"

tls:text.tls:line: who would still rob other people's houses?

sense.def: who (on earth)

tls:text.tls:line: who would still rob other people's houses?

sense.def: engage in stealing; start stealing

tls:text.tls:line: [for 有亡 read 亡有] Therefore, there would be no more robbers and murderers.

sense.def: bandits

seg.line: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and rulers who would attack each other's countries?

sense.def: a notable; a dignitary

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and rulers who would attack each other's countries?

sense.def: 老之將至 nominaliser converting a subject-VP predicate sentence into an abstract nominalisation

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and rulers who would attack each other's countries?

sense.def: each others' N 相亂國 “vt each others' state"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and rulers who would attack each other's countries?

sense.def: each others' N 相亂國 “vt each others' state"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and rulers who would attack each other's countries?

sense.def: relative clause marker equivalent to 而

tls:text.tls:srcline: 猶有大夫之相亂家、諸侯之相攻國者乎？
tls:text.tls:line: Would there still be great ones who would bring each other's families into disorder and rulers who would attack each other's countries?

sense.def: 臣之弒君者 “ministers who assassinate their rulers"

sense.def: one another

sense.def: one another

sense.def: the inhabited world cf. 天之下

tls:text.tls:line: If this was the case, the world would be in order.

seg.line: 故聖人以治天下為事者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故聖人以治天下為事者，
tls:text.tls:line: Therefore, as for the wise men, who address themselves to the task of governing the world,

sense.def: the person of extraordinary and creative talent (with untensed predicate)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故聖人以治天下為事者，

sense.def: a sage; any sage (with tensed predicate)

sense.def: 把N1算是N2 consider N1 as N2

tls:text.tls:line: If, therefore, everyone in the world spared each other, then order would prevail.

sense.def: all the world> everyone everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: If, therefore, everyone in the world spared each other, then order would prevail.

tls:text.tls:line: If, therefore, everyone in the world spared each other, then order would prevail.

tls:text.tls:line: But if everyone harms each other, then disorder will reign.

sense.def: mutually Vt each other

tls:text.tls:line: But if everyone harms each other, then disorder will reign.

sense.def: hate openly, detest, dislike strongly; LY 4.3: truly and properly dislike 甚惡"strongly dislike"

tls:text.tls:line: But if everyone harms each other, then disorder will reign.

sense.def: there is political chaos; there was a rebellion

tls:text.tls:line: But if everyone harms each other, then disorder will reign.

sense.def: take a hostile attitude towards, act hatefully towards

sense.def: the result is; consequently

sense.def: must; must not fail to

sense.def: urge the contextually determinate N to V

the flatterers; the sycophants

awl
savoury (and probably sweet)
well
as the first thing, to start with, before anything else, before something else
become dry; dry out

divine, superhuman; numinous; divinely efficient; of divine powers; divinely inspired
generally: snake; also: snake-like dragon

love more> prefer
love more> prefer

seg.line: 是故不勝其任而處其位，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是故不勝其任而處其位，

cause someone to go as far s to do something
the ruler as being primarily administratively in charge of people

mixed with impurities and sediment; impure
get weaker, decline
for no good reason, to no purpose; empty-handed
brag openly about, parade (one's good points)
objective effects achieved, achievements, results, work results
have a great deal of, abound in
pay no proper attention to 忽於
forget about> ignore, neglect; disregard (sometimes: the fact that S); fail to pay proper careful attention to, heed, fail to be mindful of
become (ruler, one's own enemy etc)
true gentleman
think (longingly) of; think of as desirable; think of as admirable
seek after, pursue

a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。
abstract: raise to a higher level
never
marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence, often as being basic
be truly intelligent
in one's mind; in one's heart
be clever
in a (needlessly) complex and involved way
offer explanations (by way of teaching); make oneself clearBUDDH: engage in preaching (= 說法 )
even if
to work hard, toil; put in an honest effort; make a strenuous effort 甚勞
aim for; be mainly concerned with as one's task, concentrate on, concentrate one's efforts on; strive for (success); be concerned to; devote one's efforts to

be dilatory with respect to; be slow in

seg.line: 是以不憚舉其國以攻人之國；

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以不憚舉其國以攻人之國；
tls:text.tls:line: so they do not fear to mobilize their own countries to attack the countries of others;

sense.def: for this objective reason

tls:text.tls:line: so they do not fear to mobilize their own countries to attack the countries of others;

tls:text.tls:line: so they do not fear to mobilize their own countries to attack the countries of others;

sense.def: the state of a contextually determinate person (many examples need to be moved here)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 是以不憚舉其國以攻人之國；
tls:text.tls:line: so they do not fear to mobilize their own countries to attack the countries of others;

sense.def: launch an attack (which is not necessarily successful) against; direct attack; assault, personally attack (a person); sometimes used very generally: attack (an opponent, in any way) [The examples have to be distributed into the subcategories below.]
